location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省广州市
location.en: Guangzhou, Guangdong, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的省级广播电视大型综合传媒机构，为实行企业化运作的正厅级事业单位。由原南方广播影视传媒集团、广东人民广播电台、广东电视台、南方电视台、广东省广播电视技术中心整合组建而成。
description.en: A provincial-level large-scale comprehensive media organization in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China. It is a department-level public institution operating on a corporate model. It was formed by the integration of the former Southern Media Corporation, Guangdong People's Radio, Guangdong Television, Southern Television, and Guangdong Provincial Radio and Television Technology Center.

nodes.id: 南方广播影视传媒集团

zh-cn: 南方广播影视传媒集团

description.zh-cn: 中国内地第一个由省、市、县广播电视系统企事业单位联合组成的全省性事业集团，于2014年整合并入广东广播电视台。
description.en: The first provincial-level business group in mainland China formed by the joint venture of radio and television enterprises and institutions from provincial, municipal, and county levels. It was integrated into Guangdong Radio and Television in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 广东省唯一的省级电台，前身为广州市播音台，于2014年整合并入广东广播电视台。
description.en: The only provincial-level radio station in Guangdong Province, formerly known as Guangzhou Broadcasting Station. It was integrated into Guangdong Radio and Television in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 成立于1959年的省级电视台，前身为广州电视台。于2014年整合并入广东广播电视台。
description.en: A provincial television station established in 1959, formerly known as Guangzhou Television Station. It was integrated into Guangdong Radio and Television in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 由广东经济电视台和广东有线广播电视台重整而成的电视台，于2014年整合并入广东广播电视台。
description.en: A television station formed by the reorganization of Guangdong Economic Television and Guangdong Cable Radio and Television. It was integrated into Guangdong Radio and Television in 2014.

nodes.id: 广东省广播电视技术中心

zh-cn: 广东省广播电视技术中心

description.zh-cn: 负责中央和省级广播电视节目在全省的发射、转播、传输与覆盖的机构，于2014年整合并入广东广播电视台。
description.en: An organization responsible for the transmission, relay, and coverage of central and provincial radio and television programs throughout the province. It was integrated into Guangdong Radio and Television in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 广东广播电视台台长。
description.en: Director of Guangdong Radio and Television.

description.zh-cn: 广东广播电视台副台长兼总编辑。
description.en: Deputy Director and Editor-in-Chief of Guangdong Radio and Television.

en: The People's Government of Guangdong Province

description.zh-cn: 广东广播电视台的上级机构。
description.en: The superior organization of Guangdong Radio and Television.

en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 批准广东广播电视台组建的机构之一。
description.en: One of the organizations that approved the establishment of Guangdong Radio and Television.

nodes.id: 国家新闻出版广电总局

zh-cn: 国家新闻出版广电总局
en: State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television

description.zh-cn: 批准广东广播电视台组建方案的机构。
description.en: The organization that approved the establishment plan for Guangdong Radio and Television.

description.zh-cn: 全国首家商业电视媒体，后与广东有线广播电视台重整为南方电视台。
description.en: The first commercial television media in China, later reorganized with Guangdong Cable Radio and Television to form Southern Television.

description.zh-cn: 于1994年开播的有线电视台，后与广东经济电视台重整为南方电视台。
description.en: A cable television station launched in 1994, later reorganized with Guangdong Economic Television to form Southern Television.

description.zh-cn: 管辖广东广播电视台旗下经济科教频道和股市广播的媒体集团。
description.en: A media group that has jurisdiction over the Economy, Science & Education Channel and the Stock Market Radio of Guangdong Radio and Television.

nodes.id: 广东广播电视台经济科教频道

zh-cn: 广东广播电视台经济科教频道

description.zh-cn: 广东广播电视台旗下的电视频道，前身为广东经济电视台，现由南方财经全媒体集团管辖。
description.en: A television channel under Guangdong Radio and Television, formerly Guangdong Economic Television, now under the jurisdiction of Southern Finance Omnimedia Corp.

nodes.id: 广东广播电视台股市广播

zh-cn: 广东广播电视台股市广播

description.zh-cn: 广东广播电视台旗下的广播频率，现由南方财经全媒体集团管辖。
description.en: A radio frequency under Guangdong Radio and Television, now under the jurisdiction of Southern Finance Omnimedia Corp.

description.zh-cn: 泛指香港地区的电视台。其节目竞争促使广东电视台在1988年进行改革。
description.en: A general term for television stations in Hong Kong. Competition from their programs prompted Guangdong Television to undergo reforms in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 广东电视台的前身，筹建时隶属于广东电台，1979年改称广东电视台。
description.en: The predecessor of Guangdong Television, it was subordinate to Guangdong Radio during its preparatory phase and was renamed Guangdong Television in 1979.

relationships.source: 南方广播影视传媒集团

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月23日，原南方广播影视传媒集团与广东人民广播电台、广东电视台等机构整合组建为广东广播电视台。
description.en: On April 23, 2014, the former Southern Media Corporation was integrated with Guangdong People's Radio, Guangdong Television, and other institutions to form Guangdong Radio and Television.

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月23日，广东人民广播电台与南方广播影视传媒集团、广东电视台等机构整合组建为广东广播电视台。
description.en: On April 23, 2014, Guangdong People's Radio was integrated with Southern Media Corporation, Guangdong Television, and other institutions to form Guangdong Radio and Television.

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月23日，广东电视台与南方广播影视传媒集团、广东人民广播电台等机构整合组建为广东广播电视台。
description.en: On April 23, 2014, Guangdong Television was integrated with Southern Media Corporation, Guangdong People's Radio, and other institutions to form Guangdong Radio and Television.

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月23日，南方电视台与南方广播影视传媒集团、广东人民广播电台等机构整合组建为广东广播电视台。
description.en: On April 23, 2014, Southern Television was integrated with Southern Media Corporation, Guangdong People's Radio, and other institutions to form Guangdong Radio and Television.

relationships.source: 广东省广播电视技术中心

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月23日，广东省广播电视技术中心与南方广播影视传媒集团、广东人民广播电台等机构整合组建为广东广播电视台。
description.en: On April 23, 2014, Guangdong Provincial Radio and Television Technology Center was integrated with Southern Media Corporation, Guangdong People's Radio, and other institutions to form Guangdong Radio and Television.

description.zh-cn: 广东广播电视台是广东省人民政府直属事业单位。
description.en: Guangdong Radio and Television is a public institution directly under The People's Government of Guangdong Province.

relationships.source: 国家新闻出版广电总局

description.zh-cn: 于2013年12月25日批复了《关于广东广播电视台组建方案》的报告，推动了其成立。
description.en: On December 25, 2013, it approved the report on the formation plan of Guangdong Radio and Television, promoting its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 2001年7月1日，广东经济电视台与广东有线广播电视台重整为南方电视台。
description.en: On July 1, 2001, Guangdong Economic Television and Guangdong Cable Radio and Television were reorganized to form Southern Television.

description.zh-cn: 2001年7月1日，广东有线广播电视台与广东经济电视台重整为南方电视台。
description.en: On July 1, 2001, Guangdong Cable Radio and Television and Guangdong Economic Television were reorganized to form Southern Television.

relationships.source: 广东广播电视台经济科教频道

description.zh-cn: 经济科教频道的运营由南方财经全媒体集团管辖。
description.en: The operation of the Economy, Science & Education Channel is under the jurisdiction of Southern Finance Omnimedia Corp.

relationships.source: 广东广播电视台股市广播

description.zh-cn: 股市广播频率的运营由南方财经全媒体集团管辖。
description.en: The operation of the Stock Market Radio frequency is under the jurisdiction of Southern Finance Omnimedia Corp.

description.zh-cn: 为与香港电视竞争，广东电视台于1988年2月14日开始进行节目改革。
description.en: In order to compete with Hong Kong television, Guangdong Television began program reforms on February 14, 1988.

description.zh-cn: 广州电视台在筹建时行政上隶属于广东电台，直至1981年7月独立建制。
description.en: During its preparatory phase, Guangzhou Television was administratively subordinate to Guangdong Radio until it became an independent entity in July 1981.

description.zh-cn: 广州电视台于1979年1月1日改呼号为广东电视台。
description.en: Guangzhou Television changed its call sign to Guangdong Television on January 1, 1979.
